headline: Dell Taps India AI Factory And Education Push As Valuation Lags
summary: Dell Technologies (NYSE:DELL) is partnering with NxtGen AI to build what the companies describe as India’s first and largest dedicated AI factory. The initiative is aimed at supporting generative and advanced AI workloads across sectors such as healthcare, financial services, and manufacturing. Dell has also introduced a new portfolio of devices, services, and curriculum designed for education customers preparing students for AI era job requirements. Dell Technologies, through its core PC,...
